item.description: Open to all artists. Session will feature 4 models in interactive poses. It will be held on Saturday March 10th from 1-5 at the New Art Center in Newtonville. The first hour will be a warm-up starting with gesture moving into longer poses with the goal of establishing a long pose for the remainder of the session. The remaining three hours will be one long pose unless there is a majority census to break the remaining three hours into two poses. Models will be Andrea & Ed, Julia & Dennis.  This session will be held in the gallery and can comfortably fit 25 artists. With a model stand as well as track lighting, it will be a very pleasant room for working. Accepted medium - dry and watercolor. Sorry but no oil paints. Some easels are available but if you have a portable easel, I would encourage you to bring it. Fee: $25 for 4 hours & 4 models. Please sign up here if you intend to go.
item.name: 4 Models, 4 Hours - March 10th, 1-5pm, Newtonville, $25
